author: daxian-dbw
body:
Reverts PowerShell/PowerShell#10454

It turns out this optimization brings in a breaking change (see https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/10477#issuecomment-527655997): `$MyInvocation` is different comparing to before the optimization change. I tried to fix the breaking change, but couldn't without introducing more hacky code. Given that, that PR should be reverted.
title: Revert the PR "Make `ForEach-Object` faster for its commonly used scenarios"
